participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

ksads_homicidal_raw_835_p.Description: In the past two weeks, how often did your child think seriously about wanting to kill someone? | 0=Not at all; 1=Rarely; 2=Several days; 3=More than half the days; 4=Nearly every day

ksads_homicidal_raw_836_p.Description: Was there ever a time that your child thought seriously about wanting to kill someone? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_homicidal_raw_837_p.Description: Was there ever another time that your child thought seriously about wanting to kill someone? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_homicidal_raw_838_p.Description: In the past two weeks, did your child actually make any preparations to kill someone, like buy a gun or explosives? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_homicidal_raw_839_p.Description: Was there ever a time that your child made plans to kill someone or go on a killing spree? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_homicidal_raw_840_p.Description: Was there ever another time that your child made plans to kill someone or go on a killing spree? | 0=No; 1=Yes

ksads_homicidal_raw_841_p.Description: You said that in the past your child thought seriously about wanting to kill someone. When was that? If this was true of your child more than once, let me know when it was the most serious.

ksads_homicidal_raw_842_p.Description: You said that in the past your child made plans to kill someone or go on a killing spree. When was that? If this was true of your child more than once, let me know when it was the most serious.
